attributes.action: Enforce total recycling for all councils
attributes.additional_details: Recycling has become something of a lottery. While in one country they will take your glass, in another they will not. Knowing finding new landfill sites is becoming harder and knowing waste levels are increasing, in the face of global warming and resource shortages we request that ALL waste is recycled and collected by our councils. If other countries can do it then so can we.
